description: Source code for the Home screen component of a React Native note-taking application. It displays a list of notes, includes search functionality, and provides navigation to an editor screen. The component manages note interactions such as editing, pinning, deleting via context and navigation props.

methods.name: onPressItem
methods.description: Handles pressing on a note item to navigate to the editor screen with the note's ID.

methods.name: onLongPressItem
methods.description: Handles long-pressing on a note item, presenting options to edit, pin/unpin, delete, or cancel.
